revision.text:
{{Infobox Berry |name = #53 Roseli |image = [[File:Roseli.png]] |caption = This Berry is sweet with a hint of bitterness and has a lingering sweet scent. The scent of this Berry plant attracts wild Pokémon. |growtime = 7h |harvest = 38 berries |replant = 5% |points = 2,500 |flavor =
*0 spicy *0 dry *25 sweet *10 bitter *0 sour }} '''Roseli''' is a type of [[Berries|Berry]] that can be planted in the [[Farm]]. It can be obtained by surrounding an empty plot with at least 1 ripe [[Mago]], at least 1 ripe [[Nanab]], at least 1 ripe [[Magost]] and at least 1 ripe [[Watmel]]. It emits an aura that increases the chance of encountering a wandering Pokemon. {| class="wikitable" |+ Growth Stages ! !! Sprout !! Taller !! Bloom !! Berry |- ! Time passed since planting | 40 mins 10 secs || 1 hour 24 mins || 3 hours 30 mins || 7 hours - 14 hours |- ! Animation |
[[File:AllTreeSprout.png|50px]] ||
[[File:RoseliTreeTaller.png|50px]] ||
[[File:RoseliTreeBloom.png|50px]] ||
[[File:RoseliTreeBerry.png|50px]] |- ! Aura (wandering chance) | ||
x1.01 ||
x1.02 ||
x1.03 |} === Possible Planting Formations === You can fill your [[farm]] in the following way to obtain this berry. {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" |+ Farm |- | style="width: 40px;" | [[Mago]] || style="width: 40px;" | || style="width: 40px;" | [[Magost]] || style="width: 40px;" | || style="width: 40px;" | [[Mago]] |- | [[Nanab]] || || [[Watmel]] || || [[Nanab]] |- style="height: 26px;" | || || || || |- | [[Magost]] || || [[Mago]] || || [[Magost]] |- | [[Watmel]] || || [[Nanab]] || || [[Watmel]] |}

revision.comment: Remove seed stage from growth table, add aura description to growth table, center text in aura row.
